title: I am 39 RP far from getting 2 skins!
body: See title, what can I do in order to get 39RP. Please help I really really want to get Mow Cow Alistar at 750RP ( October Sale) and Pickpocket Twitch!

replies.body:
https://imgur.com/a/q5gOy 
There is my drawing with a poro i tried my best but is kinda hard to do a drawing in paint maybe if it was irl i could do it better :D
But i hope you like it, have a nice day!
Ayyyyy that's an excellent poro if I say so myself! Refresh your client and you should see your new RP total with the added 39 RP ^_^
There is a fun and creative way you can get some RP from Riot. Just draw a picture and show it to a Riot Employee [BroPoro :)] and you might just get rewarded with some RP.
